content.rendered:
Prelims & Mains Exam

UPSC Exam Previous Question Papers

We have provided UPSC Prelims, mains, and optional previous year question papers. One of the most important aspects of your IAS exam preparation is to solve the UPSC previous year question papers. Practicing previous years’ question papers is one of the significant steps in the civil services exam preparation.If you are looking for specific optional papers then check out UPSC Prelims, Mains and Optional Subjects previous year question
 
One of the most important aspects of your IAS exam preparation is to know the current events. Only practicing the authentic IAS question paper will give you a real feel of the pattern and style of the UPSC exam. Here, UPSC Prelims and Mains Previous Year Question Papers Download PDF

UPSC Prelims Previous Year Question Papers

UPSC Prelims Previous Year Question Papers
Download PDF
UPSC Prelims Previous Year Question Paper – 2018Download PDF
UPSC Prelims Previous Year Question Paper – 2017Download PDF
UPSC Prelims Previous Year Question Paper – 2016Download PDF

UPSC Mains Previous Year Question Papers

UPSC Mains Previous Year Question PapersDownload PDF
UPSC Mains Previous Year Question Paper – 2018Download PDF
UPSC Mains Previous Year Question Paper – 2017Download PDF
UPSC Mains Previous Year Question Paper – 2016Download PDF
